assignments._comment: When a goalType is entered this sets the cardLink
When a goalSpecific is entered this sets the dailyGoalText

assign.eat_slowly_5_additional: Take an additional 5 minutes to have {{choice}}
assign.eat_slowly_20_min: Take at least 20 minutes to have {{choice}}
assign.eat_slowly_10_times: Chew each bite 10 times while having {{choice}}
assign.eat_slowly_20_times: Chew each bite 20 times while having {{choice}}
assign.add_2_servings: Add two servings of vegetables to {{choice}}
assign.record_vegetables: Email yourself the vegetables you eat for {{choice}}

assign.double_favorite_vegetable: Double the serving of your favorite vegetable in your {{choice}}
assign.stretch_10_walk_45: Stretch for 10 minutes and walk for 45 minutes in the {{choice}}
assign.stretch_10_walk_30: Stretch for 10 minutes and walk for 30 minutes in the {{choice}}
assign.stretch_5_walk_10: Stretch for 5 minutes and walk for 10 minutes in the {{choice}}
assign.stretch_5: Stretch for 5 minutes and walk for 15 minutes in the {{choice}}
